entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as someone to inform about the students' lack of knowledge.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who speaks out of turn and gets points deducted from Gryffindor.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the teacher who deducts points from Gryffindor for Hermione's behavior.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who calls Hermione a know-it-all.

relationships.description: Snape deducts points from Gryffindor for Hermione's behavior.
Hermione gets her points deducted by Snape.
